[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Real MeasureTheory Set

theorem P2017AMCB_20 :
  volume.prod volume {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ∈ Ioo 0 1 ∧ p.2 ∈ Ioo 0 1 ∧
